miml.classifiers.miml.meta

Class MIMLBagging

  • java.lang.Object
    • miml.classifiers.miml.MIMLClassifier
      • miml.classifiers.miml.meta.MIMLBagging
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IMIMLClassifier, IConfiguration, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner

    public class MIMLBagging
extends MIMLClassifier

    Class implementing an ensemble algorithm using bagging. For more information, see Breiman, L. (1996). Bagging predictors. Machine learning, 24(2), 123-140.

    Version:
    20180717
    Author:
    Alvaro A. Belmonte, Eva Gibaja, Amelia Zafra
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • MIMLBagging

        public MIMLBagging(IMIMLClassifier baseLearner,
                   int numClassifiers)
        Constructor of the class. Its default setting is: @li sampleWithReplacement=false @li threshold=0.5.
        Parameters:
        baseLearner - The base learner to be used.
        numClassifiers - The number of base classifiers in the ensemble.
